data.actual_result: Nothing Happens , You only get switched back to discord.
data.expected_result: Discord Should preview the selected image above the text bar .
data.short_description: Cant Share Images Through An External App.
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch Discord (Discord Should be running before proceeding to the next step) - Launch The Gallery/Application You want to Share the Image With - Use the Share Button to Select And Share the image to Discord
